entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
